short_description: Computes intermediate statistics necessary for finding a matrix's principal components.
long_description: For a matrix X, computes X'X over rows on the partition.  These summaries are aggregated in future steps to compute the principal components.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The table containing the input attributes.
input_tables.description: The table containing the input attributes.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the target_table columns that contain the data, which must be numeric. The default value is every target_table column.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the target_table columns that contain the data, which must be numeric. The default value is every target_table column.
